text: I haven't played most of the games Alberto Gonzalez composed for and this is no exception. I did play the NES version of Asterix which I thought was absolutely fine, so I'm guessing it might be the same on the GB. He's truly gifted when it comes to creating music that immediately grabs you with its beats and melodies. Always catchy.
author: SupraDarky

text: My absolute favorite ost from him are the  GB Turok games, check them out golden!

text: @TheGreenEclipse Definitely some great themes from those games, I uploaded a few ones already!

author: Gaming will NEVER be good again

text:
Yes, he's great!!
My favourite soundtrack of his so far is Lucky Luke for GBC. I'm working on doing piano covers of every single theme in the soundtrack. :)
I haven't played this specific Asterix game yet, and hadn't heard this theme before! It's great.

@Alberto J. Gonz치lez You are an amazing composer. Thanks so much for your work. Have you still been working on games in recent years? Anything we all need to check out because we might have missed it? :)
author: Burkhart von Klitzing

text: @Burkhart von Klitzing Thank you!! I don't compose much nowadays, not as I did before, that's for sure! But you can listen to one of my latest 8 bit soundtrack here: https://soundcloud.com/joemcalby_zx/sets/the-sword-of-ianna
